channel.title: Help me plz!

well i whant to know how i get my xp rates of my server higher its now like uhm 4xp each hit (lmao) and 12xp dummy (lmao) :'D sorry
how i get it up plz help

item.title: Help me plz!
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

[quote=“gothic, post:3, topic:91787”]case 823:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You hit the dummy…”);
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((1playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((1playerLevel[3]), 3);
actionTimer = 12;[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 10:35:59 AM[/size][hr]and now :)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 10:37:34 AM[/size][hr]nvm i got it :0[/quote]

Its god you sorta got it yourself but try not to triple post, thanks
